sentences.en: A trade delegation will visit Kuwait.
sentences.cn: 一个贸易代表团将访问科威特。

sentences.en: Failure to do so defeats the very purpose of delegation.
sentences.cn: 如果不这样做的话,就会失去授权的意义.

sentences.en: However, the earliest judicial decisions interpreting the delegation doctrine contained broad, uncompromising statements.
sentences.cn: 然而, 最早期的司法裁决在解释授权理论时包含了广泛和不妥协的陈述.

sentences.en: Of course, the scope of Congress'delegation is often indeterminate.
sentences.cn: 当然, 国会授权的范围常常是模糊不定的.

sentences.en: Some delegation members later said they would consider investment in Zhuhai.
sentences.cn: 随后,考察团部分成员表示将考虑在珠海投资置业.

sentences.en: Such delegation frees managers to focus on more important issues.
sentences.cn: 这样的授权工作使得管理者能集中精力去做更重要的事情.

sentences.en: Text: The delegation was invited to visit Zhuhai from Macau.
sentences.cn: 世界华商组织联盟应邀从澳门前来我市参观考察.

sentences.en: The Chinese delegation was headed by Vice Premier Wang Qishan.
sentences.cn: 双方已经具有庞大和不断增进的贸易关系.

sentences.en: The delegation doctrine remains available to use in truly extreme cases.
sentences.cn: 在真正极端的案子里仍可使用授权理论.

sentences.en: The delegation from China seems to be quite a sizeable one.
sentences.cn: 张樟只是在关键的时候伸头进来唱了一句就引起了全场轰动,就这样一曲成名了.

sentences.en: The delegation of responsibility and authority decentralizes decision making.
sentences.cn: 职权和责任的授予使决策分散.

sentences.en: The discussion thus far has concerned delegation of legislative power.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止,以上的讨论都涉及立法权的授予.

sentences.en: The following principles are guides to delegation of authority.
sentences.cn: 以下各项原则是授权的准绳.

sentences.en: The handover ceremony was also attended by the members of the delegation.
sentences.cn: 出席交接仪式的还有观礼团成员.

sentences.en: There the system of wartime price controls was challenged on delegation grounds.
sentences.cn: 在该案中,战争时期的价格控制以授权为由受到质疑.

sentences.en: Thus, the Court concluded that the delegation was unconstitutionally broad.
sentences.cn: 有鉴于此, 最高法院决定,授权过于宽泛,属违宪行为.

words.tran_cn: 代表团；代表的地位；代表制度；代表的派遣

trans.tran_en: a group of people who represent a company, organization etc
